Html:
Hi,

I would like to use citations in my document, but I would like them to be hidden by default. They are for my own reference and shouldn't be printed in the final document.

 

Is there any way I can modify the included citations so that the font of the inline citations is set to "Hidden"?

 

Thanks!

Scott

Check out the macro at http://bibword.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Styles_FAQ&referringTitle=Documentation#Q9

It's intended to make all in-text citations appear in superscript. You can easily adapt it to format the text as hidden. Just change

s.Font.Superscript = True

into

s.Font.Hidden = True
